code:
%%{Security_ZeroTrust}}}%%
flowchart TD
    subgraph Detect[Security_OAuth2]
        direction LR

        subgraph Signals[Security_ZeroTrust]
            S1[Security_ZeroTrust]
            S2[Security_ZeroTrust]
            S3[Security_Firewall]
            S4[Security_Encryption]
            S1 & S2 & S3 & S4
        end

        subgraph Prioritize[Security_ZeroTrust]
            P1[Security_Firewall]
            P2[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            P3[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            P4[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            P1 --> P2 --> P3 --> P4
        end

        Signals --> Prioritize
    end

    subgraph Investigate[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        direction TB

        subgraph Reproduce[Security_Firewall]
            direction LR
            R1[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            R2[Security_Firewall]
            R3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            R1 --> R2 --> R3
        end

        subgraph Diagnostics[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            direction LR
            D1[Security_OAuth2]
            D2[Security_ZeroTrust]
            D3[Security_Encryption]
            D4[Security_Firewall]
            D1 --> D2 --> D3 --> D4
        end

        subgraph Analysis[Security_ZeroTrust]
            direction LR
            A1[Security_OAuth2]
            A2[Security_Encryption]
            A3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            A4[Security_OAuth2]
            A1 --> A2 --> A3 --> A4
        end

        Reproduce --> Diagnostics --> Analysis
    end

    subgraph Tools[Security_OAuth2]
        direction LR

        subgraph ErlangTools[Security_OAuth2]
            direction TB
            ET1[Security_Encryption]
            ET2[Security_Firewall]
            ET3[Security_OAuth2]
            ET4[Security_Firewall]
            ET5[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            ET1 --> ET2 --> ET3 --> ET4 --> ET5
        end

        subgraph ERLMCPTools[Security_Encryption]
            direction TB
            MT1[Security_OAuth2]
            MT2[Security_Firewall]
            MT3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            MT4[Security_ZeroTrust]
            MT1 --> MT2 --> MT3 --> MT4
        end

        subgraph ExternalTools[Security_Encryption]
            direction TB
            XT1[Security_OAuth2]
            XT2[Security_ZeroTrust]
            XT3[Security_Encryption]
            XT1 --> XT2 --> XT3
        end

        ErlangTools & ERLMCPTools & ExternalTools
    end

    subgraph Fix[Security_Firewall]
        direction TB

        subgraph Strategy[Security_OAuth2]
            direction LR
            F1[Security_ZeroTrust]
            F2[Security_ZeroTrust]
            F3[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            F1 --> F2 --> F3
        end

        subgraph Implementation[Security_OAuth2]
            direction LR
            I1[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            I2[Security_ZeroTrust]
            I3[Security_Encryption]
            I4[Security_Encryption]
            I1 --> I2 --> I3 --> I4
        end

        subgraph Validation[Security_Firewall]
            direction LR
            V1[Security_OAuth2]
            V2[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            V3[Security_Encryption]
            V4[Security_Firewall]
            V1 --> V2 --> V3 --> V4
        end

        Strategy --> Implementation --> Validation
    end

    subgraph DeployFix[Security_Firewall]
        direction LR

        subgraph Release[Security_OAuth2]
            RL1[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            RL2[Security_Firewall]
            RL3[Security_Firewall]
            RL1 --> RL2 --> RL3
        end

        subgraph Verify[Security_Firewall]
            direction LR
            PV1[Security_Firewall]
            PV2[Security_Firewall]
            PV3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            PV1 --> PV2 --> PV3
        end

        Release --> Verify
    end

    subgraph PostMortem[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        direction LR

        subgraph Document[Security_OAuth2]
            direction LR
            DOC1[Security_Encryption]
            DOC2[Security_Firewall]
            DOC3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            DOC4[Security_Firewall]
            DOC1 --> DOC2 --> DOC3 --> DOC4
        end

        subgraph Improve[Security_Firewall]
            direction LR
            IMP1[Security_ZeroTrust]
            IMP2[Security_OAuth2]
            IMP3[Security_ZeroTrust]
            IMP4[Security_IntrusionDetection]
            IMP1 --> IMP2 --> IMP3 --> IMP4
        end

        Document --> Improve
    end

    Detect --> Investigate
    Investigate --> Tools
    Tools --> Fix
    Fix --> DeployFix
    DeployFix --> PostMortem

    %% Feedback loops
    DeployFix -.->|âŒ Fix doesn't work| Investigate
    PostMortem -.->|ðŸ”„ Continuous improvement| Detect

    style Detect fill:#fee2e2,stroke:#ef4444,stroke-width:2px
    style Investigate fill:#fef9c3,stroke:#eab308,stroke-width:2px
    style Tools fill:#e0e7ff,stroke:#6366f1,stroke-width:2px
    style Fix fill:#dcfce7,stroke:#22c55e,stroke-width:2px
    style DeployFix fill:#dbeafe,stroke:#3b82f6,stroke-width:2px
    style PostMortem fill:#f1f5f9,stroke:#64748b,stroke-width:2px

    classDef critical fill:#fecaca,stroke:#dc2626,stroke-width:2px
    classDef tool fill:#ddd6fe,stroke:#8b5cf6,stroke-width:1px

    class P1 critical
    class ET1,ET2,ET3,ET4,ET5,MT1,MT2,MT3,MT4,XT1,XT2,XT3 tool
repo_description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) SDK for Erlang
